pages.text: Drawers are dedicated to storing large amounts of 1, 2, or 4 types of item. They are very useful if placed near your crafting stations when filled with a stockpile of a common crafting materials.

Right-click to put items into them, and double right-click to put all relevant items in your inventory into the drawer. Left-click to pull out one item, and shift-left-click to pull out a stack.$(br)A 1x1 storage drawer can store a total of 2048 instances of the type of item (32 stacks).

A variety of upgrades are available to drawers to slightly change their functionality.$(br2)$(italics)Storage upgrades are not available. For larger storage sizes, use multiple drawers or the $(l:storage/silo)Silo.$(l)

A Drawer Key prevents other types of items from entering a drawers' slot if it becomes empty. There are other types of keys that can be rotated through by placing the key by itself into a crafting grid.

If you don't like any of the wood options, Framed Drawers can be crafted with other blocks to change their appearance. The block to the top-left of it in the crafting grid will be used as a base, to the left of it as a front cover, and the top of it as a frame. $(br2)$(italics)It's best to use solid blocks with this.
